price: 121. Bango wana nde esika na bango ya kofanda ekozala lifelo, mpe bakozua eloko ekokimisa bango na yango te.
arabic: أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ مَأۡوَىٰهُمۡ جَهَنَّمُ وَلَا يَجِدُونَ عَنۡهَا مَحِيصٗا

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: ulāika mawāhum jahannamu walā yajidūna ʿanhā maḥīṣan
